content: Paying builders for their dream home can be a complex process for homeowners, especially when it comes to progress payments under the NSW HIA Lump Sum contract. To help homeowners navigate this process, this article provides a comprehensive overview of progress payments under the NSW HIA Lump Sum contract and the payment schedule requirements. It covers commonly asked questions such as the difference between progress claim and payment claim, how progress claim works, and how progress payments are calculated. It also explains the progress claim process, security of payment progress claim, and the final progress claim, followed by the standard progress payment schedule in NSW and the role of the Security of Payment Act in regulating progress payments.
